author: francescobrivio
body:
#### PR description:
This PR updates the L1T Menu tag in the MC GTs for 2023/2024/Run4 to the latest available tag, i.e. `L1Menu_Collisions2023_v1_1_0-v2_xml`, as requested in [this CMSTalk message](https://cms-talk.web.cern.ch/t/update-of-the-2023-l1-menu-tag-l1menu-collisions2023-v1-1-0/23386/3).

In addition, the `run3_[data|hlt]_relval` symbolic GTs are updated as well with the same tag via the autoCondModifier `L1TUtmTriggerMenuForRelValForRun3`.

*EDIT:*
As per @missirol's request I also updated the same tag in `Configuration/HLT/python/autoCondHLT.py`

FYI @caruta

The GT differences are:
 - **2023 design**:
 https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/131X_mcRun3_2023_design_v4/131X_mcRun3_2023_design_v5
 - **2023 realistic**:
 https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/131X_mcRun3_2023_realistic_v4/131X_mcRun3_2023_realistic_v5
 - **2023 cosmic realistic**:
 https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/131X_mcRun3_2023cosmics_realistic_deco_v4/131X_mcRun3_2023cosmics_realistic_deco_v5
 - **2023 cosmic design**:
 https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/131X_mcRun3_2023cosmics_design_deco_v4/131X_mcRun3_2023cosmics_design_deco_v5
 - **2023 realistic HI**:
    - ~https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/131X_mcRun3_2023_realistic_HI_v9/131X_mcRun3_2023_realistic_HI_v10~
    - Superseeded by `131X_mcRun3_2023_realistic_HI_v11` which has the correct L1T Menu for HI (and it's also identical to the v9 GT)
 - **2024 realistic**:
 https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/131X_mcRun3_2024_realistic_v2/131X_mcRun3_2024_realistic_v3
 - **Phase2 realistic**:
 https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/131X_mcRun4_realistic_v3/131X_mcRun4_realistic_v4

#### PR validation:
Successfully tested with
`runTheMatrix.py -l 140.001,160.0,12434.0,12834.0,23234.0 -j 8 --ibeos`

#### Backport:
Not a backport, but a 130X backport will be provided soon.
title: Update L1T Menu tag for 2023/2024/Run4 in MC GTs
